about-me.description:
Hello, I'm Alexander! I am passionate about development, particularly front-end applications. Over the years, I have worked with a wide range of technologies, and I have gained excellent knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Currently, my preferred tool is Vue.js, and I enjoy building engaging and user-friendly applications with it. 
 As a social person, I value communication and teamwork. I am actively seeking a full-time position with a team that shares my passion for simplifying everyday tasks and making life and business more productive and convenient. 
 In my previous roles, I have gained practical experience working within a team using Agile/Scrum methodology. I thrive on complex and non-standard tasks, and I am a fast learner, always eager to learn new things.
 If you are looking for a talented front-end developer to join your team, I believe I would be a valuable addition. Please feel free to reach out to me to discuss how I can help you achieve your goals.

projects.title: Lunch
projects.description: Application for employees to order food from different cafes, personal account, order to a friend, reports for the period, operator account, administrator account.
projects.technology: nuxt, sass, vuex, axios, vee-validate, date-picker,

projects.title: Book reading
projects.description: Application for reading books, where you can set goals for reading one or more books for a certain period, create a library, progress graph, workout mode, multilingual.
projects.technology: node, express, mongoDB, react, redux, styled-components, axios, i18n

projects.title: KidsLike
projects.description: Application for children that develops healthy habits, where parents can create tasks for the week and rewards for completing tasks, the child receives points for which he can choose a reward.
projects.technology: react, redux, styled-components, axios, moment, i18n

projects.title: Events
projects.description: Application for finding cool events, around the world, with the ability to buy tickets.

projects.title: Filmoteka
projects.description: Application for finding movies, everyone can find the right movie for themselves, with ratings, descriptions and watching the trailer.

projects.title: Ice-Cream
projects.description: Cafe network website, customer reviews, location, contacts.
